{"id":1193352051,"question_id":72,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1709536287,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1193352051/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"42.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minDistance(String word1, String word2) {\n        int m = word1.length();\n        int n = word2.length();\n        int[] dp = new int[n + 1];\n\n        // Initialize the DP table\n        for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) {\n            dp[j] = j;\n        }\n\n        // Fill the DP table\n        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {\n            int prev = dp[0];\n            dp[0] = i;\n            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {\n                int temp = dp[j];\n                if (word1.charAt(i - 1) == word2.charAt(j - 1)) {\n                    dp[j] = prev;\n                } else {\n                    dp[j] = 1 + Math.min(Math.min(dp[j], dp[j - 1]), prev);\n                }\n                prev = temp;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[n];\n    }\n}\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
